question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 70 years. Matt's father saw the Comet when he was 48 years old. Matt saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was Matt when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Matt saw the Comet for the second time when he was 48 years * 2= <<48*2=96>>96 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 70 years, so Matt saw the comet for the first time when he was 96 years - 70 years = <<96-70=26>>26 years old.
#### 26
